lead_paragraph: Pentagon officials said the Americans were not involved in any combat role, despite photographs that showed commandos assisting fighters during their offensive against the Islamic State.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Commandos Work With Syrian Fighters in Push Toward ISIS Stronghold
headline.main: U.S. Commandos Work With Syrian Fighters in Push Toward ISIS Stronghold

snippet: Pentagon officials said the Americans were not involved in any combat role, despite photographs that showed commandos assisting fighters during their offensive against the Islamic State.
abstract: American commandos assist Syrian opposition fighters in campaign to retake Raqqa, Syria from Islamic State; Defense Dept confirms their presence but denies they are partaking in combat role.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
